sql.if: and ( o.id like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchWord}, '')), '%') or DATE(o.order_date) between #{startDate} and #{endDate} or od.product_id like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchWord}, '')), '%') or p.product_name like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchWord}, '')), '%') or o.order_status like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchWord}, '')), '%') )

mapper.select: select o.id as o_id, o.user_id, o.total_price, o.order_item_count, o.order_date, o.order_status, o.order_name, o.zipcode, o.address_default, o.address_detail, o.phone, od.id as od_id, od.order_id, od.product_id, od.product_price as product_total_price, od.product_count, p.id as p_id, p.product_name, p.product_price from order_tb o left outer join order_detail_tb od on(o.id = od.order_id) left outer join product_tb p on(od.product_id = p.id)

select o.id as o_id, o.user_id, o.total_price, o.order_item_count, o.order_date, o.order_status, o.order_name, o.zipcode, o.address_default, o.address_detail, o.phone, od.id as od_id, od.order_id, od.product_id, od.product_price as product_total_price, od.product_count, p.id as p_id, p.product_name, p.product_price from order_tb o left outer join order_detail_tb od on(o.id = od.order_id) left outer join product_tb p on(od.product_id = p.id) where 1 = 1
order by o.id desc, od.id desc limit #{startIndex}, #{limit}

select odt.product_id, pt.product_name, sum(odt.product_count) as product_order_count, pt.product_price, sum(pt.product_price * odt.product_count) as total_order_price, max(ot.order_date) as last_order_date from order_detail_tb odt left outer join order_tb ot on(ot.id = odt.order_id) left outer join product_tb pt on(odt.product_id = pt.id) where ot.user_id = #{id} group by odt.product_id, pt.product_name, pt.product_price limit 0, 6

select count(*) from ( select count(*), o.id from order_tb o left outer join order_detail_tb od on(o.id = od.order_id) left outer join product_tb p on(od.product_id = p.id) where 1 = 1
group by o.id ) as orderList
select count(*) from order_tb o left outer join order_detail_tb od on(o.id = od.order_id) left outer join product_tb p on(od.product_id = p.id) where 1 = 1

select o.id, o.user_id, o.total_price, o.order_item_count, o.order_date, o.order_status, o.order_name, o.zipcode, o.address_default, o.address_detail, o.phone, o.payment_id, o.request, od.product_id, od.product_count, od.product_price, p.payment_name, pt.product_name from order_tb o left outer join order_detail_tb od on(o.id = od.order_id) left outer join payment_tb p on(o.payment_id = p.id) left outer join product_tb pt on(od.product_id = pt.id) where o.id = #{id} and o.order_status = '결제완료' order by o.order_date desc limit 0, 6
select order_date from order_tb where user_id = #{userId} order by order_date desc limit 1;

select order_date as orderDate, order_status as orderStatus, sum(total_price) as totalPrice, sum(order_item_count) as totalCount from order_tb ot where order_status = '결제완료' and order_date between date(#{startDate}) and date(#{endDate}) group by date(order_date) union all select order_date as orderDate, order_status as orderStatus, sum(total_price) as totalPrice, sum(order_item_count) as totalCount from order_tb ot where order_status = '환불완료' and order_date between date(#{startDate}) and date(#{endDate}) group by date(order_date);

select min(dailyAmount) as minDailyAmount, avg(dailyAmount) as avgDailyAmount, max(dailyAmount) as maxDailyAmount from (select order_date, sum(total_price) as dailyAmount from order_tb where order_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and order_status = "결제완료" group by order_date) as amout_tb

select odt.product_id productId, pt.product_name productName, sum(odt.product_price * product_count) productPrice, sum(odt.product_count) productCount from order_tb ot left outer join order_detail_tb odt on(ot.id = odt.order_id) left outer join product_tb pt on(odt.product_id = pt.id) where order_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} group by odt.product_id order by productCount desc limit 0, 5

select odt.product_id productId, pt.product_name productName, sum(odt.product_price * product_count) productPrice, sum(odt.product_count) productCount from order_tb ot left outer join order_detail_tb odt on(ot.id = odt.order_id) left outer join product_tb pt on(odt.product_id = pt.id) where order_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} group by odt.product_id order by productPrice desc limit 0, 5

select ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '결제완료', total_price, 0)), 0) totalPrice, ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '결제완료', order_item_count, 0)), 0) totalCount, ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '환불완료', total_price, 0)), 0) refundPrice, ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '환불완료', order_item_count, 0)), 0) refundCount, ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '결제완료' and date(order_date) = curdate(), total_price, 0)), 0) todayTotalPrice, ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '결제완료' and date(order_date) = curdate(), order_item_count, 0)), 0) todayTotalCount, ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '환불완료' and date(order_date) = curdate(), total_price, 0)), 0) todayRefundPrice, ifnull(sum(if(order_status = '환불완료' and date(order_date) = curdate(), order_item_count, 0)), 0) todayRefundCount from order_tb;
select order_name orderName, order_date orderDate, order_status orderStatus from order_tb order by id desc limit 0, 7;

select date(order_date) as `date`, sum(if(order_status = '결제완료', 1, 0)) as orderCount, sum(if(order_status = '결제완료', total_price, 0)) as orderAmount, sum(if(order_status = '환불완료', 1, 0)) as refundCount, sum(if(order_status = '환불완료', total_price, 0)) as refundAmount from order_tb where date(order_date) >= date(now() - interval 7 day) group by date(order_date) order by date(order_date) desc limit 0, 7;
